article:
'Jack Bernstein', also known as "John Dodick," "Kid Murphy," and Young Murphy,"
(November 5, 1899, in New York, New York â December 26, 1945) was an American
boxer. He was World Junior lightweight Champion, with the title taken from and
later lost to Johnny Dundee . {{cite news |author= |title=Hoots
|date=December 24, 1923 |work=Time Magazine
|url=http://www.time.com/time/magazine/article/0,9171,727679,00.html
|accessdate=August 10, 2008 }} Bernstein, who was Jewish, was inducted
into the International Jewish Sports Hall of Fame in
2000. [http://www.jewishsports.net/BioPages/JackBernstein.htm Jack Bernstein
(John Dodick) ] at www.jewishsports.net
